H0.text: In mythology, who was condemned to an eternity of rolling a stone up a hill. Atlas

H1.text: In mythology, who was condemned to an eternity of rolling a stone up a hill. Tantalus

H2.text: In mythology, who was condemned to an eternity of rolling a stone up a hill. Prometheus

H3.text: In mythology, who was condemned to an eternity of rolling a stone up a hill. Siziph

A4.text: The gods forced him to roll an immense boulder up a hill only for it to roll back down every time it neared the top, repeating this action for eternity.
